    • Method Detail

      • readJsonFromFile

        public static <T> T readJsonFromFile(java.lang.String fileLocation,
                                     java.lang.Class<T> type)
                              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Reads a JSON file at the specified location and returns an Object of the class type specified representing the JSON file attributes and values. This method will always return an Object of the type specified,
        Parameters:
        fileLocation - The absolute path of the JSON file
        type - Class type to be use to represent the JSON format file
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • readJsonFromIFile

        public static <T> T readJsonFromIFile(IFile json,
                                      java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Reads a JSON file specified in the IFile and returns an Object of the class type specified representing the JSON file attributes and values. This method will always return an Object of the type specified.
        Parameters:
        json - The IFIle containing the JSON file
        type - Class type to be use to map the json attribute:value pairs
        Returns:
        An Object of type T representing the JSON format string, null otherwise.

      • writeJsonToFile

        public static void writeJsonToFile(java.lang.String fileDestination,
                                   java.lang.Object jsonJavaObject)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a JSON file representation of the Object received at the specified destination.
        Parameters:
        fileDestination - Absolute path where the JSON file will be written.
        jsonJavaObject - The object to be represented as a JSON.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the named file exists but is a directory rather than a regular file, does not exist but cannot be created, or cannot be opened for any other reason.

      • writeJsonToFile

        public static void writeJsonToFile(java.io.File fileDestination,
                                   java.lang.Object jsonJavaObject)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • convertJavaObjectToJson

        public static java.lang.String convertJavaObjectToJson(java.lang.Object jsonJavaObject)
        Converts an Object to a JSON interpretation of that object.
        Parameters:
        jsonJavaObject - The object to be converted.
        Returns:
        JSON object as string.

      • convertJsonToJavaObject

        public static <T> T convertJsonToJavaObject(java.lang.String jsonString,
                                            java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Converts a JSON to an Object of type T, which is an interpretation of that JSON string.
        Parameters:
        jsonString - JSON format string.
        type - Class type to be use to represent the JSON format string
        Returns:
        An Object of type T representing the JSON input string.
